p.d: Eight years later, Roxane is released from prison and seeks to prove her innocence. Her ex-husband is now with with her best friend, Ines, daughter of the powerful businessman François Ortiz. Her daughter Alma refuses to see her. By chance, she meets lieutenant Combas and strongly protests her innocence. Directed by: Lionel Bailliu (France, 2016) Screenplay: Isabel Sebastian, Lionel Bailliu, Yann Le Gal Cast: Julie de Bona (Roxane Delage), Sagamore Stévenin (Hugo Combas), Olivia Bonamy (Sabine Maupin), Thomas Jouannet (Alexis Delage), Jeanne Bournaud (Ines Ortiz), Thibault Vinçon (Pablo Ortiz), Olivier Claverie (Guy Marchepied), Bernard Lecoq (François Ortiz) Genre: drama
